ygData.subject: SV: Neriak Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: I think he means the SR aprentice robes you can buy in Neriak, but i have to make you disopointed. I think SR robes are race specifik. Not sure tho. /Askur
ygData.messageBody:
I think he means the SR aprentice robes you can buy in Neriak, but i have to make you disopointed. I think SR robes are race specifik.
Not sure tho.



/Askur Wizzie of Veeshan

>From: Cristie <cristie@...>
>
>Hmmmm....one from the dark elves? You must mean getting one somewhere like
>Najena...there is a dark elf npc (Najena) in there that has quite a nice
>robe.. or you could go to Befallen and bonk the one down in third level as
>well...you can invis and run through Nek forest to lavastorm to go to
>Najena and/or just go to befallen in east commons...otherwise I don't know
>what you mean off a player or what... I don't think there are many who have
>robes they want to give up...most of us earn them :)
>
>
